entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
